turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. Can you help me place a Starbucks order from the Starbucks on Walnut Street in Philadelphia?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Looking to get a tall cafe latte with soy milk and whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said tall caffe latte with soy milk is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, with whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'll send your order to the location on walnut street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 7 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. That's all I needed. Thank you.
